text.hammer.fabulous_graphics_warning: Fabulous graphics are disabled due to inherent compatibility issues!
text.hammer.welcome_0: §r§7Some of your settings have been changed to improve the recording:
text.hammer.welcome_1: §r§7 • Your chat has been §chidden§r§7 - configure it in §6Chat Settings§r§7!
text.hammer.welcome_2: §r§7 • Your global chat has been §chidden§r§7 - configure it in §6Chat Settings§r§7!
text.hammer.welcome_3: §r§7 • Your command feedback has been §chidden§r§7 - configure it in §6Chat Settings§r§7!
text.hammer.welcome_4: §r§7Have fun and ask §bvini2003#0875§r§7 or §bCubxity#7801§r§7 if you require help!
